modName: You're Not Going to Find Whoever Did This
summary: Tired of people spewing this garbage from their mouths? No, you're not going to find whoever did this.
descriptionHtml:
"I'm going to find whoever did this."

NO YOU AREN'T. This implies that you actually care that the person was murdered, AND that you're going to track down who did it. The amount of times that this line is actually applicable is hilariously low. I've seen people who saw the murderer say it... people that wanted the person dead... people who shouldn't care at all...

Well, this extremely small mod simply removes that line from the game. They may still say something, as there are other applicable lines, but it won't be as retarded.

Yours truly,
The untalented Spitsonpuppies
author: Spitsonpuppies

files.name: You're Not Going to Find Whoever Did This
